amendment.description: To provide an additional $322,000,000 for safety equipment for United States forces in Iraq and to reduce the amount provided for reconstruction in Iraq by $322,000,000.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 1817 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 49 - 37. Record Vote Number: 376.

Amendment SA 1817 proposed by Senator Dodd. (consideration: CR S12351-12354; text: CR S12351) To provide an additional $322,000,000 for safety equipment for United States forces in Iraq and to reduce the amount provided for reconstruction in Iraq by $322,000,000.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1817 proposed by Senator Dodd.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 1817 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 49 - 37. Record Vote Number: 376.
